examples.example: 我很有礼貌地询问老板这件商品多少钱。

translate.english: I asked the boss very politely how much this commodity cost.

examples.example: 我开心地问这件漂亮衣服多少钱。

translate.english: I happily ask how much this beautiful dress is.

examples.example: 我微笑着询问服务员这顿美味的饭菜多少钱。

translate.english: I smiled and asked the waiter how much this delicious meal cost.
